name: Mech-Zed
description:
Mech-Zed Is a simple multiplayer RTS with the focus on taking control of territories on a map in order to grow your army's size and power. Up to 4 players can play against each other. There is also a singleplayer mode to practice against a simple AI.

Controls:

  • Camera Movement: W, A, S, D
  • Camera Rotation: Q , E
  • Select Units: Left Click / Drag
  • Attack Units: Right Click
  • Move Units: Right Click
  • Menu: Esc

In order to host a multiplayer game online you will need to port forward port 4296

NOTE: There's an inconsistent bug for building different units, open the pause menu, go back into game and you'll be able to interact with the selection UI

Produced in 2 weeks for MechJam II

Team:
  • Benn Abbott - Network and UI Programmer
  • Clinton Pinto - VFX and Sound programmer
  • Dale Bee - Music & SFX
  • Daniel Koitka - Gameplay Programmer
  • David Fleming - 3D Artist

Used Assets:

Visual:

  • "Mech Constructor: Light and Medium Robots" by Slava Z
  • "Robot Logo" - by yogaperdana7
